title.rendered: Charity Fundraiser at Centreville United Methodist Church

content.rendered: On April 25, 2016 United Help Ukraine and Centreville United Methodist Church held a fundraiser to benefit Ukraine’s internally displaced people and wounded warriors. Thank you to everyone who came and supported this event! We are greateful to Pastor Michelle and entire Centreville United Methodist Church for hosting this fundraiser. Especial thank you to Tamara Rudolph and her family for organizing the event, and to all the people who cooked so much wonderful food and came to volunteer. We raised $1,715 and some of the money will go to the treatment of Roman Kubyshkin for whom we also raised money at the February 19th, 2016 concert at the Embassy of Ukraine in Washington DC. We will update you with pictures and final information about how the money is spent soon. In the meantime, below is the link to the news coverage by Oleksandr Yanevskyy of Voice of America, to whom we are always thankful for covering UHU’s events: http://ukrainian.voanews.com/content/charity-dinner-centerville/3310724.html
